value.title: How to create a Public IP Prefix to manage your Azure public endpoints | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Are you tired of managing your multiple public IP addresses in Azure? Anavi Nahar joins Donovan Brown to show how Public IP Prefix enables you to use one prefix to manage your public endpoints in Azure. You can have predictable, contiguous public IP addresses that don't change as you scale. With a prefix,
